rows.label: tlk400806_msg0001
rows.name: Oh! I saw him just a little while ago!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0002
rows.name:
He's so quick, he got
away again! Gahahah!!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0003
rows.name:
I was working here when I
heard footsteps behind me.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0004
rows.name:
I turned around and it was that boy.
I called out to stop him, but he ran
off in more of a panic than usual.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0005
rows.name:
He's not from Torigo. No kid
from there would have the
guts to come this far out.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0006
rows.name:
But I don't know where he went. I'm
too busy with work to chase him.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0007
rows.name:
If you've got Blades with
you, why don't you try
tracking his footprints?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0008
rows.name:
It was raining when he ran off.
If you follow his tracks, you
might find where he went.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0009
rows.name:
Hey, you have Blades with you and
you can't even track footprints?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0010
rows.name:
It just rained, and if you
work in the forest you'd
spot them right away...

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, I guess you're amateurs
in the forest, so it can't
be helped! Gahahah!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0012
rows.name:
Alright, want me to show you?
I'm not exactly uninterested
in where that boy went.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0013
rows.name: What will you do?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0014
rows.name: Ask for help

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0015
rows.name: Figure it out ourselves

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0016
rows.name: Look at the ground very carefully.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0017
rows.name:
The footprints in the mud,
the grass with mud on it...

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0018
rows.name:
If you find anything even slightly
unnatural, and it's at regular
intervals, then those are his tracks.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0019
rows.name: How about it? See them now?

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0020
rows.name: You've got guts...

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0021
rows.name:
But finding a Blade who can track
footprints might be tough.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0022
rows.name:
If it seems like it's taking too long,
don't hesitate to call me over!

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0023
rows.name:
It's no problem at all
for me to lend a hand.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0024
rows.name:
You see the footprints,
right? Now just follow them.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0025
rows.name:
I don't think stealing is
right, but I have a feeling
that boy has his reasons.

rows.label: tlk400806_msg0026
rows.name: Be good to him, will you?
